meanings.sent1: The antifemale group protested against women's rights.
meanings.sent2: Her antifemale remarks were hurtful and disrespectful.
meanings.sent3: The antifemale cat hissed at all the female kittens in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds gathered in an antifemale manner, casting a shadow over the sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's antifemale attitude made the girls feel unwelcome in the classroom.

meanings.definition: Showing hostility or discrimination towards females.
meanings.sent1: The antifemale behavior of the boss created a toxic work environment for the female employees.
meanings.sent2: The antifemale jokes made everyone uncomfortable at the party.
meanings.sent3: The antifemale goose chased away all the female ducks from the pond.
meanings.sent4: The antifemale policies of the company led to a decrease in female representation.
meanings.sent5: The antifemale graffiti on the wall was quickly removed by the community.
